ack.p: The authors really want to thank the technicians that did the sampling in the field, Suor Kimhuor, Chhum Moeun, Chhuoy Kalyan and the different field authorities including all the Directors and Teachers of the 24 primary schools. The authors also would like to thank Sylvaine Jego for statistical advices, Vincent Herbreteau for the help for mapping, and Richard Paul for correcting the manuscript.
